attributes.action: make motorbike fuel duty fair in respect to the amount of emissions they create
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yes obviously I am a biker forced from my car because of the cost of fuel.

We now find that some cars actually pay less road tax even though they create more emissions than motorbikes.

We should be encouraging motorbike use as it pollutes less and uses less road space.

Whilst I appreciate bikes can be dangerous in the wrong hands it can not get away from the fact that they are cleaner to run.

How many cars do you see with one person in them????

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
